title: Pixel 1 - phone shut off, screen black, doesn't seem to be charging
content:
My Pixel 1 just stopped working. It was working one minute, then I looked over and the screen was black. It won't turn on - no sounds, nothing appears on the screen. I plug it into the wall charger / charge by laptop but nothing happens. 

I hear the phone mount on my laptop but of course with the phone switched off I can't see the drive.

I try calling the phone and call goes to answer phone.

I tried pushing / holding power button, down arrow (together and separate). I try plugging / unplugging quickly. And have just put it inside a ziplock bag in the freezer,

I installed a new battery a few months ago - did it myself without any issues. The old battery wasn't holding a charge.

Any thoughts on what it might be?
